ygData.subject: RE: [rest-discuss] RFC for REST - Leonard's book?
ygData.msgSnippet: WM Some concepts are not available to lazy minds; you have to think about them...hard.  Use your dictionary.  Draw pictures.  Thimk. This is not about saying

WM>> Some concepts are not available to lazy minds; you have to think about
them...hard.  Use your dictionary.  Draw pictures.  Thimk.

This is not about saying "Sorry you dimwits, if you can't understand it,
tough!" 
This is about trying to educate the masses to guard against chaos (i.e.
keeping there from being a flood of non-REST marketed and implemented as
REST simply because they didn't know any better.)

-Mike Schinkel
http://www.mikeschinkel.com/blogs/
http://www.welldesignedurls.org/
